description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共漳州市委书记，福建省人民政府副省长，福建省人大常委会副主任。他是企业家曹德旺的哥哥。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Secretary of the CPC Zhangzhou Municipal Committee, Vice Governor of the Fujian Provincial People's Government, and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Fujian Provincial People's Congress. He is the older brother of entrepreneur Cao Dewang.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省
location.en: Fujian Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，通称中国。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党漳州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党漳州市委员会
en: Zhangzhou Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在福建省漳州市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Zhangzhou, Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Fujian Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 福建省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 福建省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Fujian Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 福建省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the Fujian Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国企业家，福耀集团董事局主席。他是政治人物曹德淦的弟弟。
description.en: A Chinese entrepreneur, chairman of the Fuyao Group. He is the younger brother of politician Cao Degan.

description.zh-cn: 一家专注于汽车安全玻璃和工业技术玻璃领域的跨国公司，由曹德旺担任董事局主席。
description.en: A multinational company focusing on automotive safety glass and industrial technical glass, with Cao Dewang as its chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university directly administered by the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曹德淦是曹德旺的哥哥。
description.en: Cao Degan is the older brother of Cao Dewang.
Cao Degan is from Fuqing, Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 曹德淦是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: Cao Degan is a politician of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党漳州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 曹德淦曾担任中共漳州市委书记。
description.en: Cao Degan served as the Secretary of the CPC Zhangzhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 曹德淦曾担任福建省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Cao Degan served as the Vice Governor of the Fujian Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 福建省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 曹德淦曾担任福建省人大常委会副主任。
description.en: Cao Degan served as the Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Fujian Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 曹德旺是福耀集团的董事局主席。
description.en: Cao Dewang is the Chairman of the Board of Fuyao Group.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科页面分类，曹德淦是厦门大学的校友。
description.en: According to Wikipedia page categories, Cao Degan is an alumnus of Xiamen University.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科页面分类，曹德淦是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia page categories, Cao Degan is a member of the Communist Party of China.
